description: When done editing an inventory in INVedit, it can be built into a Minecraft world file, and then the world can be loaded into the Minecraft game. INV files can also be imported into "chests" using MCEdit, a Minecraft world editor.
NOTE: Minecraft is a sandbox construction game that allows players to build and destroy blocks and other objects in a 3D environment.

common_filenames.description: Objects.inv - The name Sphinx automatically assigns to a project's object inventory file.
